#summary what txtckr must be able to do...
#labels Phase-Requirements

= Introduction =

*Compulsory* or _desired_ functions list for what txtckr will be able to process, retrieve, create, store+retrieve, update and delete.


= Details =

Functional requirements:
  * *process* incoming OpenURL 0.1 and 1.0 requests for all supported formats
  * *create* requests to *retrieve* data from other webservices, OpenURL resolvers
  * *store+retrieve*, *update* and *delete* native objects representing formats supported by OpenURL
  * *store+retrieve*, *update* and *delete* native objects representing formats supported by [http://www.refman.com/support/risformat_reftypes.asp]RIS specification
